00014 void BasicInterval::completeParsing(rapidxml::xml_node<> const &node) {
00015   rapidxml::xml_attribute<> *attr = node.first_attribute("min");
00016   if( NULL!=attr ) {
00017     std::string tmp(attr->value(), attr->value_size());
00018     parseLower(tmp);
00019   }
00020   attr = node.first_attribute("max");
00021   if( NULL!=attr ) {
00022     std::string tmp(attr->value(), attr->value_size());
00023     parseUpper(tmp);
00024   }
00025 }

00027 // observers 
00028     
00029 std::string BasicInterval::getStringLower() const {
00030   std::ostringstream oss;
00031   print_lower(oss);
00032   return oss.str();
00033 }
00034 
00035 std::string BasicInterval::getStringUpper() const {
00036   std::ostringstream oss;
00037   print_upper(oss);
00038   return oss.str();
00039 }
00040 
00041 std::ostream &BasicInterval::print_domain(std::ostream &out) const {
00042   if( isSingleton() ) 
00043     return print_lower(out);
00044   else
00045     return print_upper(print_lower(out<<'[')<<", ")<<']';
00046 }
00047 
00048 std::ostream &BasicInterval::toXml(std::ostream &out, size_t tabs) const {
00049   std::fill_n(std::ostream_iterator<char>(out), tabs, ' ');
00050   out<<'<'<<getTypeName();
00051   if( hasLower() )
00052     print_lower(out<<" min=\"")<<'\"';
00053   if( hasUpper() )
00054     print_upper(out<<" max=\"")<<'\"';
00055   return out<<"/>";
00056 }
